title: Rune Page
body: First of all, I just didn't know where to put my discussion LOL. Sorry if it was wrong. I just want to ask where in the shop can I buy rune pages? Unless, I cannot buy anymore? I only have three so far.

replies.body:
You can buy them under the *Gameplay* section in the store, just make sure your sorting on the left side says *Show All*, as displayed in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

I hope this helped!
